tool_description: Get daily Petrol, Diesel and LPG fuel prices for Indian cities, states
name: Daily Fuel Price India
title: Daily Fuel Price India

api_list.name: Fuel Price by City
api_list.description: Get current petrol and diesel prices for a city using query parameters.

required_parameters.name: state
required_parameters.description: State name you got in state list or city list api

required_parameters.name: city
required_parameters.description: State name you got in city list api

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://daily-fuel-price-india1.p.rapidapi.com/api/fuel/price/Andhra Pradesh/Hyderabad"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "daily-fuel-price-india1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://daily-fuel-price-india1.p.rapidapi.com/api/fuel/price/{state}/{city}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "daily-fuel-price-india1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
